description: V.V. is a mysterious boy with blond hair longer than his body. He is the older twin brother of Charles zi Britannia, but looks much younger because he has gained the power of immortality through "Code", like C.C. Also like her, he can grant Geass contracts and gave both his brother and Rolo Lamperouge their Geass abilities, among others in the Geass Order. He succeeds C.C. in becoming leader of the Geass Order, a secret organization that studies and produces Geass users.
name: V.V.
